name: Bob Robertson, 1979 Monsters. Series 3. #002
description: Second card in series of 7. Collect #001 through #007 to receive #008 Chase Award via airdrop.*****  Card #007 is only available to collectors who burn 1 copy each of Series 3 #DTB1, #DTB2, and #DTB3 before the drop time of #006. ******** digital capture of original painting, gouache on vintage baseball card, 2021.   ******* NFT image is for personal use, no commercial rights are granted. Twitter @thr33som3s and IG @thr33somes to see upcoming cards and new series. ************ ALL editions in Series 2 will have FUTURE FUNCTIONALITY.  Collect them now to use them later! thr33som3s just seem to keep coming back for more and more utility!
